translation.text: T1 Western Line, T7 Olympic Park Line - All Richmond services will terminate and commence from Olympic Park due to urgent infrastructure repairs caused by weather conditions at Central. Customers travelling to and from stations between Lidcombe and the City will need to interchange trains to continue their journey.

Buses are replacing trains between Mt Victoria, Lithgow and Bathurst in both directions due to infrastructure damage caused by bushfires. 

Following 4 services will run as per timetable:
3:42am Lithgow to Bathurst
5:46am Bathurst to Central
5:47pm Central to Bathurst
10:17pm Bathurst to Lithgow

There is no forecast when the line can reopen. Please allow additional travel time and check transport apps for further details.

A-League: Sydney FC v Western Sydney Wanderers - Netstrata Jubilee Stadium, Kogarah

- Due to severe weather conditions this game has been postponed please visit www.a-league.com.au for further information.

Big Bash League Final - Sydney Sixers v Melbourne Stars - Sydney Cricket Ground, Moore Park
19:15 to 22:15
- The closest station to Sydney Cricket Ground is Central.Change for a L2 light rail service to Moore Park leaving from Chalmers Street stop at Central.
- Alternatively you can also walk to Moore Park via Devonshire Street and the Albert Tibby Cotter Walkway

Lunar New Year Twilight Parade - Chatswood Interchange, Mall & The Concourse
18:30 to 19:30
- The closest station to the event is Chatswood, however, planned weekend trackwork is taking place on the T1 North Shore Line and buses are replacing trains between Hornsby and Wynyard. 
- If you are travelling from stations between Hornsby and Wynyard, connect with a rail replacement bus to Chatswood. Express buses will be running between Chatswood and Wynyard. Alternatively, you can catch a T9 Northern Line train to Epping and change for a Metro service to Chatswood.

Super Rugby: Waratahs v Blues - McDonald Jones Stadium, Broadmeadow
19:15 to 21:15
- Valid pre-purchased match tickets include travel on Sydney Trains & Sydney Metro services.
- The closest station to McDonald Jones Stadium is Broadmeadow on the Central Coast & Newcastle Line. The stadium is approximately a 15-20 minute (1.5km) walk from the station.

Summer Racing Race Day - Kembla Grange Racecourse
From 12:00 until 18:00
- Due to trackwork on South Coast line, buses replace trains between Wollongong and Kiama.

*Sydney Olympic Park events*
Michael Buble Concert - Qudos Bank Arena
20:00 to 22:00
Transmission Australia 2020 - Sydney Showground
17:00 to 02:00
- Trains run from Lidcombe to Olympic Park every 10 minutes until 02:20.
- Additional services will be running to Penrith and Blacktown at the end of the event to get you home.

Details: https://transportnsw.info/events/2020/02
Special Events - Twilight at Taronga 2020 Summer Concert Series, until 7 March

Until Saturday 7 March on Thursday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday nights only.
6:00 pm - 9:30 pm

- From Circular Quay, catch a ferry to Taronga Zoo wharf.
- From North Sydney, change for a bus to Spit Junction in Mosman to catch connecting 247 change for another bus direct to the Zoo entrance.
- From Wynyard, change for a route 247 or M30 bus direct to the Zoo or a frequent B-Line or Military Road bus service from Carrington St to Spit Junction to connect with buses to the Zoo entrance.

Details: https://transportnsw.info/events/2020/01/twilight-at-taronga-2020-summer-concert-series

With ongoing rainfall being experienced and the potential of flash flooding, please remember to take extra care when boarding and alighting from trains, and when travelling through station concourses or platforms. Weather conditions may impact train services in some areas; Before you travel please check Transport apps or visit transportnsw.info for up-to-date train running information.
due to urgent infrastructure repairs caused by weather conditions at Central
due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Newcastle Interchange.
due to an operational issue at Clyde earlier.
Due to urgent signal equipment repairs at Coalcliff.
due to a train requiring mechanical repairs
The lift between the concourse and platforms 1, 2 and 4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please call staff at Town Hall Station on 9379 4110.

The lift between the concourse and platform 2 is temporarily out of service. Customers travelling from the city who require lift access should alight at International Airport station and catch a service from platform 1 back to Domestic Airport station. You can also call 8337 8450 for assistance.
The lift between the car park and bus terminal is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9851 7462.
The lift between the concourse and bus bay E is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9765 1161.
The lift between the concourse and Bigge Street is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9765 1161.
The lift between the concourse and platform 4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9765 1161.
The lift between the concourse and platform 1 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9765 1655.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 2/3 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9765 1161.
The lift between the concourse and bus bay D is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9765 1161.
The lift between the concourse and Jane Street is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 4780 3819.
The lift between the concourse and the street is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, ask staff or phone 4782 1902.

The public toilets at Beverly Hills station are currently unavailable while major repairs take place. Temporary toilets have been provided and are located outside the station on Tooronga Terrace. These facilities can be accessed during staffed hours. We apologise for any inconvenience.
Due to minor flooding the station access on the corner of George and Park Streets is closed.

Due to station maintenance works, the pedestrian ramp between Richmond Platform 2 and the concourse is closed. If you are unable to use the stairs, a shuttle bus to and from East Richmond station will be available.   For further assistance, please see station staff or call 9851 7248.

The public toilets at St James Station are closed while major works are taking place. Public toilets are located at the Elizabeth Street entrance to the right and in Hyde Park through the Macquarie Street tunnel up the stairs to the right. We apologise for any inconvenience.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info

Station Upgrade - Customers, due to Wynyard station upgrade the lifts from the concourse level to George Street will be closed from Saturday 8th February until July 2020. Customers will be able use alternate lifts from Wynyard Station to Carrington Street and York Street accessed via Margaret Street.  For further information or assistance, Please follow station staff instructions, station signage or call Wynyard Station on 9224 2959.
